case.title: Looking for someone to talk to... - 21
case.text:
Hi there! I'm Lydia, I'm 21 and I'm looking for someone to chat to. I want to get to know you, and just talk. Maybe it'll be platonic, maybe it'll lead somewhere else. I have no idea. Let's just play it by ear?
I'm a bookworm, I'm creative - I draw, write, paint. I love films, music etc. I like to cook. I'm a dog person.
